entries.meaning: (slang) Related to or characteristic of a smartass.
examples: I have had quite enough of your smartass remarks.

entries.meaning: (vulgar) Synonym of know-it-all, an obnoxious clever person or a person making obnoxious efforts to seem clever.
(vulgar) An insolent person, especially one who makes snide remarks.

verbs.description: smartass (third-person singular simple present smartasses, present participle smartassing, simple past and past participle smartassed)

entries.meaning: (slang) To talk like a smartass, with a lot of snide remarks.
examples: I smartassed and smack-talked half of the interview, but as I relaxed a bit more and genuinely talked with them, a strange thing happened.
